p: Data for CMIP5 models are available at https://esgf-node.llnl.gov/projects/esgf-llnl/. All SSP data are available at https://tntcat.iiasa.ac.at/SspDb/dsd?Action=htmlpage&page=about. Gridded population data for all SSPs are available at http://clima-dods.ictp.it/Users/fcolon_g/ISI-MIP. MISR aerosol data are archived in NASA Langley Research Atmospheric science Data Center. All other data as reproduced by this paper can be obtained upon request to the corresponding author (S.C.).
